data.name: Flashlight
data.detailed_description:
Play with Friends


Play with or against your friends in Flashlight. Choose to battle through the roguelite story experience solo or cooperatively with your friends, or challenge others in Capture the Flag and/or Team Deathmatch PvP modes.

Randomized Levels and a variety of enemies


Fight against waves of different zombies and bosses through procedurally generated levels.

Enemy Mercenaries


Encounter and defeat enemy mercenary groups as you try and clear out different zones and capture supply depots. Enemy mercenaries are dangerous foes as they are fully equipped with the same capabilities as the players.

Rank up and choose from 30+ different perks


Choose between four different mercenary groups to join and venture through the roguelite story mode. Each group has a different set of perks to choose from as you move up the ranks and prove yourself by earning "Merc Cred" as you go. The more things you kill, the more Cred you earn to rank up.



  • Use Bounce shots to kill your enemies around corners or Devastate your opponents with multiple rockets
  • Scavenge for scrap to craft barriers, turrets, and other defense structures
  • Earn higher scores, items, and power-ups with skill shots
  • Orchestrate and strategize with your teammates
  • Lay low hordes of zombies and bosses

Features


  • Multi-player PVP and PVE
  • AI Bot PvP teammate support
  • Procedurally generated story maps
  • Variety of weapons, specials, and power-ups
  • Waves of different zombies and bosses!

data.short_description: Salvage scrap, build defenses, and rank-up to survive against the hordes of zombies and enemy mercenaries in an action packed looter shooter roguelite survival or fight head to head with other players in Capture the Flag and Team Death Match.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: 1,7GHz dual core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel/AMD Integrated Graphics, 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may be subject to change.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2100 3.1GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 1030 2GB / AMD Radeon HD 6850 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may be subject to change.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13.6
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6630M 256 MB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may be subject to change.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.13.6
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 617 1536 MB
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may be subject to change.

content_descriptors.notes: This game depicts frequent animated violence, blood and gore, which may not be suitable for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work.
